entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 40. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clear. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 45 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
